title: Pattu Poochi lyrics Aanandha Thaandavam Song lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Pattu Poochi
Singer: Naresh Iyer, Harmony
Music: GV Prakash
Lyrics :  Vairamuthu

Pattu poochi kootai pidithathu
vatta siragal paanai eduthathu
innoru siragal ennai kudithathu
sukku sukkai nooru sukku sukkai

oru sorga thundai naanum kaana
sokki sokki aanmai naana
pachai ratham patri yerindhathu
ekku thappai ayyo ekku thappai

iru kulai thalliya vaazhai maram
en mele saaindhathu moondru tharam
thavame seyyamal thavanai illamal
devadhai thandathu kadhal varam

pattu poochi kootai pidithathu
vatta siragal paanai eduthathu
innoru siragal ennai kudithathu
sukku sukkai nooru sukku sukkai

oru sorga thundai naanum kaana
sokki sokki aanmai naana
pachai ratham patri yerindhathu
ekku thappai ayyo ekku thappai

chinnadhaga oru ichai vandhathadi munnale
andha ichai indru oru imsai aanathadi unnale

en moolayin kadhirellam indrodu azhinthathadi
kan kaana azhagellam kadal pola padinthathadi

kandu ondrada kaatrin kai theendi
kadhalin boogampathu arindhadi

indru indru ennai nindru konnadhadi pennazhagu
adi kondru kondru uyir mendru thinnathadi un azhagu

unai enni unai enni uyirellam veengukiren
vizhi paartha azhagellam viral paarka yengukiren
kanne nee konda kannil mai thottu kadhalin mudhal kavi yezhudukiren
